Changelog:
Build 2024.10.22.925
- Added button to clear addon search filter.
- Added option to add addons to favourites. They will be pinned to the top of the list.
- Added back red highlighting for addons that are disabled and waiting for an update.
- Fixed closing on escape for pop-out windows.
- Improved performance and stability by sorting addons only in the UI, not internally.

Build 2024.10.20.960
- Added button to toggle between list and tile view for the addons view.
- Fixed addon filter buttons not returning from the addon configuration view.
- Fixed vertical position of version in title bar.
- Fixed rendering of listings in the addon view.

Build 2024.10.18.0
- Removed animations.
- Fixed chevron icon rendering under button in the addon configuration view.
- Fixed the font selector being empty when using the default font.

Build 2024.10.17.1250
- Fixed input bind setters not working.
- Fixed NexusLink->Scaling not being available in the character select.
- Fixed animation speed of sidebar.

Build 2024.10.17.1170
- Entirely reworked the existing UI. This change removes the GW2-stylised windows and entirely uses ImGui to have a cohesive look between Nexus and addons.
- Implemented pop-out system. Pages can be detached from the main window into their own views.
- Merged addons window with addon options. You can now manage all addons from the addons window. Including configuring the addon's options, its input binds and its general configuration.
- Split input binds into its own sub-menu point.
- Added grouping to general settings page for more visual clarity.
- Added presets to the style editor.
- Performance improvements for UI rendering.
- Majorly reworked engine components for performance upgrades and cleaner allocation/shutdown.
- Majorly reworked internal settings API.
- Removed developer mode. The debug menu will now always show.
- Added option to disable the festive flair. Party poopers!

The new UI is still missing the about page, the changelog and some other things which will follow in a later update.
